channel.title: Note: this post will not display until it's been approved by a moderator?
channel.description:
Note: this post will not display until it's been approved by a moderator.
why does this show up for me whenever i make a post?

item.title: Note: this post will not display until it's been approved by a moderator?
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

You were spamming your across the forum so I removed your posting privileges. All of your posts are now filtered through us. You had two warnings.

Read full topic
